text: {{Infobox province | name = Central Province | native_name = | other_name = | settlement_type = Province | image_skyline = Victoria reservoir sri lanka sunken city of Teldeniya (2).JPG | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_map = Sri Lanka Central Province locator map.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location within Sri Lanka | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | established_title = Created | established_date = 1833 | established_title1 = Admitted | established_date1 = 14 November 1987 | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Kandy | seat1_type = Largest City | seat1 = Kandy | government_footnotes = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Tikiri Kobbekaduwa | leader_title1 = Chief Minister | leader_name1 = Sarath Ekanayake | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 5,674 | area_rank = 6th (8.63% of total area) | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 2558716 | population_rank = 2nd (12.97% of total pop.) | population_as_of = 2011 census | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | demographics_type1 = Gross Regional Product | demographics1_footnotes = (2010):.News Line : North, East record highest GDP growth rate | demographics1_title1 = Total | demographics1_info1 = Rs 465 billion | demographics1_title2 = Rank | demographics1_info2 = 4th (9.6% of total) | timezone1 = Sri Lanka | utc_offset1 = +05:30 | blank_name_sec1 = Official Languages | blank_info_sec1 = Sinhala, Tamil | iso_code = LK-2 | website = cpcouncil.net | footnotes = }} The Central Province ( , ) is one of the nine provinces of Sri Lanka. It is located in the central mountainous area of the island. It is the sixth largest province by area. About 2.5 million people live here. The border of this province are North Central Province on the North, Uva Province on the East, North Western Province on the West and Sabaragamuwa Province on the South and West. The province's capital is Kandy. ==Towns== ===Large towns=== * Nuwara Eliya (Municipal Council) * Matale (Municipal Council) * Gampola (Urban Council) * Dambulla (Urban Council) ===Other towns=== * Walapane * Madawala Bazaar * Nawalapitiya UC * Hatton-Dikoya UC * Wattegama UC * Ginigathena * Galewela * Akurana * Hanguranketa * Ukuwela * Kadugannawa UC * Kundasale * Naula * Laggala * Udupussellawa * Rattota * Abewela * Alawatugoda * Lindula-Talawakele UC * Pilimatalawa * Teldeniya * Kotmale * Maskeliya * Talatuoya * Walapane * Padiyapalella * Sigiriya * Watawala ==References== ==Other websites== * Central Provincial Council Sri Lanka * Central Provincial Postal Codes Sri Lanka * Cities in Central province * Searchable Map of Sri Lanka Category:Provinces of Sri Lanka Category:1833 establishments in Ceylon
title: Central Province, Sri Lanka
